a=[0,1,2,8,68,1504,127792,57140352,258023200384L,10151395367145472L,3673835865235792306176L,13318668301694192513859649536L]
b=531680718673514734573555796872790016L
t=int(raw_input())
while t>0:
    n,m=[int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    if n==12:
    	print(b%m)
    else:	
    	print(a[n]%m)
    t-=1
